test_inventory._comment: Files with more tests than this trigger 'Split Large Files' recommendation

test_file_naming._comment: pattern: Expected file naming pattern. Set to null to skip analysis. consistency_threshold: Below this % triggers recommendation.

test_method_naming._comment: pattern: Expected method naming style (camelCase, snake_case, BDD). Set to null to skip analysis. consistency_threshold: Below this % triggers recommendation.

accessibility_ids._comment: generic_id_usage_threshold: IDs used more than this trigger 'Refine Generic IDs'. centralization_threshold: Below this % triggers 'Centralize IDs'. unused_ids_threshold: More than this triggers 'Remove Unused IDs' recommendation.

test_plans._comment: orphaned/multi_plan/skipped: > threshold triggers recommendations. overlap: < threshold triggers 'Review Coverage'

screen_graph._comment: Below this percentage triggers 'Increase Navigator Adoption' recommendation

report._comment: max_items_in_summary: Items shown in tables/lists. max_items_before_collapse: Show all items if count <= this, otherwise summarize
